stories.title: What I Learned After Using an SSH Honeypot for 7 Days

stories.text:
New Smart Office Automation (NSOA),formerly known as Al Ahlia Office Automation (AAOA) Division was founded in the year 1992, the sole distributor for SHARP Office Automation Products, BenQ Interactive Display Solutions, Triumph-Adler MFPs and Partner Tech POS Solutions across the UAE.

Multifunctional Printers: Colour & Monochrome Digital Signage, Interactive Flat Panels & Projectors POS Systems, Peripherals & Accessories.

NSOA is responsible for Sales, Marketing and After Sales Servicing of SHARP Photocopiers / MFP’s and Electronic Cash Registers in complete form and their accessories including supply of Consumables and Spare Parts.

NSOA has two branches in the U.A.E (Dubai and Abu Dhabi) and the corporate showroom and Head Office is located in Dubai. NSOA has exclusive Service Centres in Dubai and Abu Dhabi and have professional arrangement for other Emirates to cater the Customer requirement.
stories.title: Show HN: NSOA – Sharp Office Automation Products and Services Across the UAE
